title: math-240-notes
text:
Math 240 Probability
This is a reading guide resource for students in my Math 240 Probability class taught at Carleton College (Northfield, MN). Our textbook is Wagaman (2021).




Wagaman, & Dobrow, A. S. 2021. Probability: With Applications and r. 2nd ed. Wiley.

title: 1  First principles of probability
text:
What to read: Read sections 1.1, 1.2, 1.3 and 1.4. Skim section 1.8 to see the generalization of property #3.
Learning goals:

title: 1  First principles of probability
text:
Day 3




Wagaman, & Dobrow, A. S. 2021. Probability: With Applications and r. 2nd ed. Wiley.

title: 2  Thinking conditionally
text:
Chapter 2 of Wagaman (2021) covers conditional probabilities and the concept of independence.
Make sure to review Chapter 1 before this chapter.




Wagaman, & Dobrow, A. S. 2021. Probability: With Applications and r. 2nd ed. Wiley.

text:

and r. 2nd ed. Wiley.
